articles.author: David Jones
articles.title: Why the marriage between the 'chippy leprechaun' and Manchester United was a hideous mismatch - Daily Mail
articles.description: Manchester United's American owners the Glazer family say they are considering selling the club as they 'explore strategic alternatives'. Some fans say the marriage was doomed from the start.
articles.content:
Even by the base standards of football chanting, one song that often echoes around Manchester United's Old Trafford ground is explicitly vile and cruel.
'He's gonna die, he's gonna die, Joel Glazer'… [+12234 chars]
